data.title: Carlos Arroyo Player Profile, Boston Celtics
data.meta_description: Get the latest news, stats and more about Carlos Arroyo on RealGM.com
data.text: Jun 27, 2001 - Carlos Arroyo went undrafted in the 2001 NBA Draft making him an Unrestricted FA. Sep 27, 2001 - Carlos Arroyo signed a contract with the Toronto Raptors. Jan 7, 2002 - The Toronto Raptors placed the contract of Carlos Arroyo on waivers. Jan 9, 2002 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Toronto Raptors, became a free agent. Mar 6, 2002 - Carlos Arroyo signed a contract with the Denver Nuggets. Mar 16, 2002 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Denver Nuggets, became a free agent. Mar 16, 2002 - Carlos Arroyo signed a contract with the Denver Nuggets. Mar 26, 2002 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Denver Nuggets, became a free agent. Mar 26, 2002 - Carlos Arroyo signed a multi-year contract with the Denver Nuggets. Aug 15, 2002 - The Denver Nuggets placed the contract of Carlos Arroyo on waivers. Aug 19, 2002 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Denver Nuggets, became a free agent. Sep 13, 2002 - Carlos Arroyo signed a contract with the Utah Jazz. Jul 1, 2003 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Utah Jazz, became a free agent. Jul 31, 2003 - Carlos Arroyo signed a contract with the Utah Jazz. Jun 30, 2004 - The Utah Jazz tendered a Qualifying Offer to make Carlos Arroyo a Restricted FA. Jul 1, 2004 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Utah Jazz, became a free agent. Jul 14, 2004 - Carlos Arroyo signed a multi-year contract with the Utah Jazz. Jan 21, 2005 - Carlos Arroyo was acquired by the Detroit Pistons, along with a TPE, from the Utah Jazz in exchange for Elden Campbell and a conditional 2006 1st round pick (DET own). Feb 15, 2006 - Carlos Arroyo was acquired by the Orlando Magic, along with Darko Milicic and a TPE, from the Detroit Pistons in exchange for Kelvin Cato and a conditional 2007 1st round pick (ORL own). Jul 1, 2008 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Orlando Magic, became a free agent. Oct 12, 2009 - Carlos Arroyo signed a contract with the Miami Heat. Jul 1, 2010 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Miami Heat, became a free agent. Jul 9, 2010 - The Miami Heat renounced their free-agent exception rights to Carlos Arroyo. Jul 22, 2010 - Carlos Arroyo signed a contract with the Miami Heat. Mar 1, 2011 - The Miami Heat placed the contract of Carlos Arroyo on waivers. Mar 3, 2011 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Miami Heat, became a free agent. Mar 6, 2011 - Carlos Arroyo signed a contract with the Boston Celtics. Jul 1, 2011 - Carlos Arroyo, previously with the Boston Celtics, became a free agent.
